characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings (mentioned),  Rhythm of War (mentioned)

characterDescription: Neturo was a Shin. His father was Vallano. Neturo fathered Szeth. He worked as a shepherd in his youth. Szeth believes he is still alive in Shinovar, though Taravangian says Neturo is dead.

characterDetails.Character: Szeth describes his father as the bearer of a different sword, a different burden. Szeth remembers time with his father as a simple one, before his family had been given to the Honorblades. After that, his gentle father had been taught to kill.
characterDetails.Notes:
Something adverse occurred between Neturo and his son, because Szeth prefers to be known as Szeth-son-son-Vallano rather than Szeth-son-Neturo. Alternatively, this may be due to the fact that Szeth does not wish to shame his father with his status as Truthless.[citation needed]
Ishar said Neturo gave him his Blade for saving Shin people from the Unmade and thanked him for letting him die.
